text: Nia duaahina daane mo nia duaahina ahina huogodoo a Job, mo ono ehoo hagaaloho huogodoo ala i mua ga lloomoi gi baahi o mee, gaa hai di nadau hagamiami damanaiee dalia a mee i di hale o maa. Digaula e haga modongoohia aga gi mee nadau aloho e haga manawa lamalia a mee i nia haingadaa huogodoo ala ne dugu anga go Dimaadua gi mee. Tangada nei mo tangada nei i digaula guu wanga nadau bahihadu mono buulei goolo gi mee.
